prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon with spiky yellow features and a fiery personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with a bright red body and a playful demeanor, perfect for urban habitats.
Design a mythical creature resembling a fiery dinosaur, with scales of orange and bright yellow spikes.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in caves, with a unique fire ability and a vibrant color scheme.
Generate a Pokemon with a bipedal stance and a fiery tail, showcasing its fiery attacks.
Make a creature that embodies the spirit of fire, with distinct red and yellow patterns.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that loves to roam mountains, with a fierce and energetic attitude.

distinctive_features: Spiky yellow crest on the head
